title: Press 53 Spotlight 2011
description: The 2011 Press 53 Spotlight showcases five short story authors and three poets earning recognition through publication and awards. Authors and poets Clare L. Martin, Maureen Sherbondy, Kate Waldman, Okla Elliott, Jen McConnell, Steve Mitchell, Anne Leigh Parrish, and Jubal Tiner.
author: Kevin Morgan Watson
